measurements_data.comments: Data from Flandres urban households; other includes inert (8.55 percent), beverage bottle packaging (1.28 percent), mixed and leftover packaging (1.21 percent), textile (6.88 percent), KGA (0.16 percent), hygenic (11.55 percent), car battery (0.45 percent), used oil (0.92 percent), cosmetic (0.4 percent), medicine (0.63 percent), other unspecified (7.15 percent), garbage bags (not packaging, 1.12 percent) waste
